title: ZipReg
author: ZipReg
created_time: June 26, 2022, 04:20:56 PMLast edit: July 20, 2022, 11:08:33 PM by ZipReg
content: Greetings Everyone! I hope you're all doing well! As you may know, I presented this project to you all as a concept piecedesigned around the iconic Jan. 3rd 2009 THE TIMES front page layout.What I did not reveal, however, is that this release is actuallya loaded crypto puzzle disguised as a conceptual art piece!  The Limited Edition pieces of The Times Traveler contain an intricate crypto puzzle which I have carefully embedded into their design. In actuality, each Limited Edition piece is in fact a "one off" that has been printed from it's own unique source. You only need one Limited Edition piece to unlock the key ofThe Times Traveler, however, having a prototype or proof may help!The best part about our crypto puzzle contest is that you do not need to destroy any of the pieces to unlock the secrets of The Times Traveler, it is hidden in plain sight!  CoolStorage.org Presents..."The Times Traveler" Limited Edition16x20 Gallery Wrapped LOADED Canvas Crypto Puzzle Your purchase is the entry fee to receive a #011-#021 Limited Edition Canvasand register as a contestant in The Times Traveler Crypto Puzzle Contest   Once distributed, I will post one CLUE to help solve the puzzle!The first person to discover the secrets and unlock the key to The Times Travelershall receive all of the tasty BTCits that are locked away inside the canvases! (Along with some pretty sweet braggin' rights as the contest winner!)I do not think about these things before hand, I only try to create unique concepts and designs,but after researching, I do believe these are the first loaded canvases ever created.  Who will discover the secrets and unlock the key to The Times Traveler?  Only TIME will tell!  Available pieces:011 - minerjones  012 - ragilab  013 - MrCryptHodl  014015 - pinky1234  016 - Dernoste  017 - Geo  018 - MoparMiningLLC  019 - raritycheck   020 - Hookzup1  021 - Hookzup1  Price:  / $110 per canvas (shipping not included)Features: 1.5" gallery framing and a quality 100+ year fade resistant canvas. * Mounting hardware will be included with each piece *Payment: Will PM detailsThank you all once again for your support, it is greatly appreciated!

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Hmmm no interest here yet? Perhaps...  (wait for it)  I'm ahead of my time!

comments.author: Hookzup1
comments.body: I would love one of these, but it's so hard to part with btc at these crazy low prices

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Quote from: Hookzup1 on June 29, 2022, 05:21:40 PMI would love one of these, but it's so hard to part with btc at these crazy low prices Hey buddy  thanks for the interest! I have a solution! You just buy the corn to go towards this at the price BTC is now, and HODL your older devalued BTC, problem solved!   On a more serious note, we are getting a little ahead of ourselves here as I haven't set an exact price yet, however, I hear you and considered offering ppal as an option after reading your reply, but after thinking about it, if there was ever a concept piece I have designed for this space that should only be purchasable in BTC, this is that piece. Shipping is a different story, I will gladly accept ppal from trusted members for that expense. Thanks again man!

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on June 30, 2022, 05:35:12 PMQuote from: Hookzup1 on June 29, 2022, 05:21:40 PMI would love one of these, but it's so hard to part with btc at these crazy low prices Agreed. Great print  Congrats on this release Thank you for the kind words Sir! Greatly appreciated! Quote from: ragilab on July 01, 2022, 07:52:54 PMHit me up, as soon they are available  Thank you, Sir! Absolutely! I have updated the OP with the final pricing on this project, it will be done on a nice quality 1.5" gallery wrapped canvas.I will notify all bidders from the prototype auction of a future date and time, in advance, so everyone will have a fair chance to choose a number preference.Thanks again for the support everyone!

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Quote from: pinky1234 on July 01, 2022, 08:44:52 PMsince i was the last bidder , i will let these guys choose first.  if these guys dont want #15 I Take it.DernostekrogothxSlyyMoparMiningLLCragilabMrCryptHodlminerjonesThank you, Sir!Just to clarify, so that everyone listed has a fair chance to choose a number, you will all be notified by me of an exact date / time in advance when they are ready.You can then come here at that time and pick your number preference, on a first come first serve basis.Thanks again!

comments.body: Quote from: ZipReg on July 01, 2022, 08:50:56 PMQuote from: pinky1234 on July 01, 2022, 08:44:52 PMsince i was the last bidder , i will let these guys choose first.  if these guys dont want #15 I Take it.DernostekrogothxSlyyMoparMiningLLCragilabMrCryptHodlminerjonesThank you, Sir!Just to clarify, so that everyone listed has a fair chance to choose a number, you will all be notified by me of an exact date / time in advance when they are ready.You can then come here at that time and pick your number preference, on a first come first serve basis.Thanks again!  Sounds good.Thank you for the update

comments.body: I was the lucky one to win the prototype auction, so I will not be bidding on one of these. Other forum members feel free!I really do like the whiteout exterior on these versions though.Thanks again, Zip!BTCBTCBTC

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Quote from: xSlyy on July 02, 2022, 03:21:06 PMI was the lucky one to win the prototype auction, so I will not be bidding on one of these. Other forum members feel free!I really do like the whiteout exterior on these versions though.Thanks again, Zip!BTCBTCBTCHey buddy  sure thing, this is only an opportunity for those listed who would like the first chance to choose a numbered piece, there is absolutely no requirement to do so. I will still include you in the release detail news, just in case.You're very wecome! Thank you for the kind words, and congrats again on snagging proto #001

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Hey guys! I am officially surrounded by loaded canvases!!  Unfortunately, I messed up the forum time calculation in the PM sent to all prototype bidders   So... For the next 48 hours those listed in OP will have first selection of the #011 - #021 Limited Edition pieces.If there are any unclaimed pieces remaining, they will then become available to all collectible community members.Thanks again for the support everyone! I'm very excited to finally be releasing this special project! Who will discover the secrets and unlock the key to The Times Traveler?  Only TIME will tell!
